scripts.asbuild:debug: asc assembly/index.ts --target debug -b build/index.debug.wasm -t build/index.debug.wat -j build/index.debug.js -d build/index.debug.d.ts
scripts.asbuild:release: asc assembly/index.ts --target release -b build/index.wasm -t build/index.wat -j build/index.js -d build/index.d.ts
scripts.asbuild: npm run asbuild:debug && npm run asbuild:release
